alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 3:57PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of western Ravalli County through 500 PM MST/400 PM PST/... At 354 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of intense snow showers along the Montana and Idaho border, that will bring strong gusty winds, with rain changing snow creating very low visibility and quickly changing road conditions along Highway 93 in the Bitterroot Valley. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds and rain changing quickly to snow as the front approaches, will create very low visibility and quickly changing road conditions. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Darby, Victor, Conner, Woodside, Pinesdale, Sula, Grantsdale, Charlos Heights, Corvallis, Como and Lost Trail Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Southern Clearwater Mountains
